=== About Me ===
My name is Abdalllah Hodieb , i live in Cairo,Egypt. I'm a computer engineering student at the Arab Academy for Science and Technology. Also im a freelance developer . I'v been using Ubuntu for 4 years nw , since (Ubuntu 8.4). I got hooked up with its power and the way it can be customized to fit your needs. I also love opensource projects, and try to share its the open source ideas and philosophies with my friends and in my community.
